section_colors.info: This setting will overwrite the style option.

header_country.info: To add a country/region, go to your [markets settings](/admin/settings/markets).

header_language.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings](/admin/settings/languages).

type.label: Content blocks display type
type.info: If content item blocks count is more than one

enable_first_level_arrow.label: Enable first level links dropdown arrow

enable_contact_links.label: Enable contact links
enable_contact_links.info: Only applies for Top above navigation logo position.

transparent.label: Transparent on Home page
transparent.info: First section should be 'Hero' section. Will only be applied for sticky header.

transparent_color.label: Links and text color
transparent_color.info: Links and icons color when header is transparent, by default this will be the paragraphs color.

link_level_1.label: Link level 1
link_level_1.info: Enter level 1 link text in order to get the megamenu to show at that spot. Please note that this is case sensitive.

link_text.label: Link title
link_text.info: For example enter 'Shop' if you want to hightlight the 'Shop' link

paragraph_info.content: The settings and blocks in this section will be used if quickview is enabled from Theme settings -> Products -> Product quickview

paragraph_filtering_and_sorting.content: Customize [filters](/admin/menus). You can find more information on filtering and sorting through [this link](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/storefront-filters)

enable_filters.label: Enable Filters
enable_filters.info: Enable filters to filter products by price, color, size, etc.

filters_by_columns.label: Options to print in columns
filters_by_columns.info: Options names which should be split into columns. Write every option name on a new line

enable_sorting.label: Enable Sorting
enable_sorting.info: Enable sorting to sort products by price, name, etc.

show_cards_background.label: Enable background
show_cards_background.info: Only applies when content layout is overlayed

enable_filters.label: Enable Filters
enable_filters.info: Enable filters to filter products by price, color, size, etc.

enable_sorting.label: Enable Sorting
enable_sorting.info: Enable sorting to sort products by price, name, etc.

phone.label: Phone
phone.info: Takes the value from 'Theme settings -> Global -> Phone', if left blank.

email.label: Email
email.info: Takes the value from 'Theme settings -> Global -> Email', if left blank.

api-key.label: Google Maps API Key
api-key.info: Embeds a map with the shop's address, pinned in the center. How to set up google api keys: https://support.google.com/googleapi/answer/6158862?hl=en

address.label: Address
address.info: Uses the shop address by default. Override it using this format: Street address,City Country/State

gallery_size.label: Gallery size
gallery_size.info: Will take priority over Content size

condensed_layout.label: Condensed layout
condensed_layout.info: Enabling this will reduce the spacings between the blocks.

price_with_title.label: Show price on title's line
price_with_title.info: If you enable this, it's recommended to disable the Price block otherwise you'll print the price twice on the page.

title.label: Block title
title.info: This field is for representational purpose only.

size_guide_page.label: Size guide page
size_guide_page.info: Should contain the size guide table contents

custom_liquid.label: Custom liquid
custom_liquid.info: Create advanced customization by adding an app snippet or other liquid code.

threshold.label: Threshold
threshold.info: Show notification, when selected variant inventory is equal or below the threshold

paragraph_info.content: Learn how to manage purchase options with selling plans [here](https://shopify.dev/themes/pricing-payments/purchase-options).

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient information form for gift card products
show_gift_card_recipient.info: Gift card products can optionally be sent direct to a recipient on a scheduled date along with a personal message. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/add-gift-card-recipient-fields)

show_expanded.name: Expanded by default
show_expanded.info: Applicable only when Collapsible is enabled.

page.label: Page
page.info: Selecting page will overwrite the field above with the page content

header.info: Products are displayed based on the Shopify Recommendations API and Search & Discovery app. Read more [here](https://help.shopify.com/en//manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations#complementary-products)

page.label: Page
page.info: Selecting page will overwrite the field above with the page content

expiration_date.label: Expiration
expiration_date.info: Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM. Time zone will be taken from the shop settings and it can be managed from [here](/admin/settings/general). More details about how to use this block [here](https://bigstart.gitbook.io/marble-documentation/pages/product-page#countdown-block).

header_checkbox.info: In case you use Checkbox as a field type.

header_options.info: In case you use Dropdown/Radios as a field type.

option_values.label: Dropdown/Radios
option_values.info: Each entry should be on a new line

paragraph_info.content: Products in this section can be managed from Theme settings -> Cart -> Upsell products

paragraph.content: Products are displayed based on the Shopify Recommendations API and Search & Discovery app. Read more [here](https://help.shopify.com/en//manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations#complementary-products)

header.info: Based on the user's last viewed products.

product_list.label: Products
product_list.info: Will be used if collection is not selected.

button_url_1.info: Defaults to the Blog URL, if chosen

blog.label: Blog
blog.info: Display articles from a Blog, instead of section blocks.

articles_count.label: Articles count
articles_count.info: Number of articles to be pulled from the Blog.

header_button.info: Requires block URL setting to not be empty.

image.label: Image
image.info: Recommended sizes: 880x1152px for portrait, for landscape - 1760x480px for high quality, 1170x320px for good quality.

form_code.label: Newsletter form code
form_code.info: For embedded forms: Klaviyo, Mailchimp etc. Leave blank to use default one.

answer-page.label: Answer (Page)
answer-page.info: If selected it will overwrite the answer field

whole_banner_link.label: Whole banner link
whole_banner_link.info: Will make the whole banner a clickable link. Leave empty if you don't need it.

image.info: Recommended sizes: For high quality - 3456x2160px. For good quality - 2304x1440px.

background_overlay_gradient.label: Background image overlay gradient
background_overlay_gradient.info: This will overwrite the Background image overlay and opacity fields.

flip.label: Flip
flip.info: Flip the order of image and content

paragraph_background.content: For best results, use an image/video with a 16:9 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio).

disable_video_autoplay_on_mobile.label: Disable video autoplay on mobile
disable_video_autoplay_on_mobile.info: Recommended to be enabled to lower mobile data usage and increase performance on mobile devices. If checked the mobile image will be used.

description.label: Video description text
description.info: Describe the video to make it accessible for customers using screen readers.

info.label: Describe the video to make it accessible for customers using screen readers.

height.label: Height
height.info: Affects desktop only. On mobile the height will be based on the video ratio.

height.label: Height
height.info: Affects desktop only. Please note if you use the medium preset and a 60-40 block you should be adding less content to the aside and aside bottom parts.

paragraph_aside_bottom.content: Please note, this will not show on mobile

whole_block_link.label: Whole block link
whole_block_link.info: Will make the whole block a clickable link. Leave empty if you don't need it.

separate_on_mobile.label: Separate slides on mobile
separate_on_mobile.info: Show each part as a separate slide on mobile.

flip.label: Flip
flip.info: Flip the order of Main and Aside blocks

paragraph_background.content: For best results, use an image/video with a 16:9 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio).

image.info: Recommended sizes: For high quality - 3456x2160px. For good quality - 2304x1440px

video.label: Video
video.info: Video file path from Admin > Settings > Files. Recommended video aspect ratio - 16:9. File format - MP4

video_mobile.label: Video - Mobile
video_mobile.info: Video file path from Admin > Settings > Files. Recommended video aspect ratio - 16:9. File format - MP4

disable_video_autoplay_on_mobile.label: Disable video autoplay on mobile
disable_video_autoplay_on_mobile.info: Recommended to be enabled to lower mobile data usage and increase performance on mobile devices. If checked the mobile image will be used.

description.label: Video description text
description.info: Describe the video to make it accessible for customers using screen readers.

info.label: Describe the video to make it accessible for customers using screen readers.

image.info: Recommended sizes: For high quality - 1712x2160px. For good quality 1140x1440px

main_image.info: Recommended sizes: For high quality - 2264x2160px. For good quality 1500x1440px

height.label: Height
height.info: Applies to image height on desktop

image.label: Image
image.info: Recommended sizes: For high quality - 1728x2304px. For good quality - 1152x1536px

paragraph_card_settings.content: Will overwrite collection values if collection is set.

button_style.label: Button style
button_style.info: Only applies when content layout is Overlayed - centered with button

marquee_position.label: Position
marquee_position.info: Please note this only applies when images are added.

text_color_header.info: This settings will overwrite the style option.

show_cards_background.label: Enable background
show_cards_background.info: Only applies when content layout is media overlayed

header_image_grid.info: For optimal user experience use at least 3 images.

enable_mobile_accordions.label: Enable accordion footer on mobile
enable_mobile_accordions.info: Please note: All blocks must have a set heading for this to work.

show_privacy_note.label: Show privacy note
show_privacy_note.info: Requires a Privacy page. More info [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/checkout-settings/refund-privacy-tos).

custom_liquid.label: Custom liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

expiration_date.label: Expiration date
expiration_date.info: Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM. Time zone will be taken from the shop settings and it can be managed from [here](/admin/settings/general).

style.label: Background style
style.info: If overlaid with other sections background is disabled.

height_mobile.label: Height - mobile
height_mobile.info: If not set desktop one will be used

section_colors.info: This setting will overwrite the style option. Applies only when overlay is set to none.

enable_slider.label: Enable slider
enable_slider.info: If not enabled the gallery will be presented in a grid format.

url.label: URL
url.info: Use this in case you want the image to be linked to a specific page

background_overlay_gradient.label: Gradient
background_overlay_gradient.info: This will overwrite the color option.

paragraph_boxed_items.content: This includes quantity widget, variant radio buttons, pagination buttons, stock progress bar and form inputs

paragraph_info.content: Bellow settings apply for colletion and article cards.

enable_localization.label: Enable localization
enable_localization.info: Once this is enabled you can show the localization selector in the announcement bar or the footer.

header.info: Checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

enable_cart_shipping_bar.label: Enable
enable_cart_shipping_bar.info: Text fields must not be blank and threshold must be greater than zero

cart_shipping_bar_threshold.label: Threshold
cart_shipping_bar_threshold.info: Enter the amount only by using numbers. The threshold will be set based on your store's currency. If you have multiple  currencies - it will be recalculated based on the currency conversion rates.

cart_shipping_bar_progress_text.label: Progress text
cart_shipping_bar_progress_text.info: Use [amount] to print the remaining amount needed for free shipping

cart_shipping_bar_empty_text.label: Empty text
cart_shipping_bar_empty_text.info: Use [amount] to print the set threshold price.

cart_upsell_product_list.label: Products, when cart has items
cart_upsell_product_list.info: Overwritten, if recommendations API is used

cart_upsell_use_recommendations_api.label: Use recommendations API
cart_upsell_use_recommendations_api.info: Products are displayed based on the Shopify Recommendations API and Search & Discovery app. Read more [here](https://help.shopify.com/en//manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

additional_checkout_buttons.label: Show additional checkout buttons
additional_checkout_buttons.info: Please be aware that third-party apps could disable these buttons. Read more [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/dynamic-checkout/compatibility).

enable_checkout_button.label: Enable cart drawer checkout
enable_checkout_button.info: Enables checkout button in the cart drawer.

enable_terms.label: Show terms
enable_terms.info: Shows checkbox to accept terms and conditions before proceeding to the checkout. Important: terms page must be set through [Policies](/admin/settings/legal). More info [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/checkout-settings/refund-privacy-tos)

continue_shopping_link.label: Continue shopping link
continue_shopping_link.info: Will be used if continue shopping type is set to standard link

empty_cart_link.label: Empty cart link
empty_cart_link.info: Will be shown when the cart drawer is empty

wrap_product.label: Wrap product
wrap_product.info: Show checkbox for order wrapping option. Requires a non-sold out product, with only default variant(no product options). If there are multiple product variants, the first available variant will be added. The product should NOT be marked as physical product and should NOT have inventory tracking enabled.

header_product_quickbuy.info: It's  not recommended to have both Quick view and Quick buy features enabled at the same time.

paragraph_product_badges.content: In order to show custom badges use a tag with a `badge:` prefix. Example: badge:Limited. Please note you can have up to 3 custom badges at most.

disable_badges.label: Disable badges
disable_badges.info: You can hide badges for individual products by adding the `hide-badges` tag.

disable_sale_badge.label: Disable sale badge
disable_sale_badge.info: You can hide sale badges for individual products by adding the `hide-sale` tag.

product_created_days_offset.label: NEW Badge days
product_created_days_offset.info: It determines either to show or not the 'New' product badge.

card_product_swap_image_on_hover.label: Swap image on hover
card_product_swap_image_on_hover.info: Show second product image when product card media is hovered

enable_images_filtering.label: Filter images
enable_images_filtering.info: Filters product images, based on the theme settings color option name and images SEO text(alt text), which must follow the following pattern: SEO Text|{option_name}:{option_value}. For example: `Great T-Shirt - Front|color:Gray`. Please note this only works for the first swatch option. You can find more information [here](https://bigstart.gitbook.io/marble-documentation/global-settings/product#filter-images)

card_product_image_alignment.label: Image alignment
card_product_image_alignment.info: Does not apply when the media size is set to Original.

header_filters_icon_swatches.info: For filters with display option of image.

swatches_option.label: Swatches option name
swatches_option.info: The option name, which will hold the swatch colors. E.g.: `Color`, `Colour`, `Material`, etc. In order to have swatches for more than one option type them separated with a comma: `Color, Material`

swatches_hex_codes.label: Hex/Swatch image codes
swatches_hex_codes.info: Pair of color name and value formatted like <Color>=<HEX Color/Swatch image>. Examples: Red=#ff0000, Yellow=yellow.png. The color name must match the variant color option name. Upload swatch images from your store's [files](/admin/settings/files). Each custom color should be on a new line.  [Learn more about color swatches](https://bigstart.gitbook.io/marble-documentation/global-settings/swatches)

swatches_size_option.label: Size option name
swatches_size_option.info: The option name for sizes. It is used to trigger the buttons selection type and size guide on product sections.
